repoSources.name: Mizzou Packages
repoSources.description: Private composer repository for University of Missouri packages.

repoSources.name: WPackagist
repoSources.description: This site mirrors the WordPress plugin and theme directories as a Composer repository.

repoSources.name: Advanced Custom Fields
repoSources.description: Private repository for Advanced Custom Fields Pro.

list.name: mizzou-wordpress/miz-hybrid-theme-defaults
list.description: Installs defaults for use of the Mizzou Hybrid Base Theme.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou-wordpress/mizzou-wp-base-defaults
list.description: Installs defaults for use of the Mizzou WordPress Base Theme.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/miz-hybrid-base
list.description: Hybrid theme made for use on University of Missouri sites.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/miz-wordpress-blocks
list.description: WordPress plugin for maintaining custom blocks. Made to be used by the hybrid theme.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou-wordpress/calendar
list.description: A model to translate Localist events for usage in Mizzou WordPress sites.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/mizzou-wp-base
list.description: Generic Mizzou Parent Theme based on the MizzouMVC framework.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou-digital/mizzoumvc
list.description: MVC-based WordPress framework for rapid theme development

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/mizzoumvc-plugin-acf
list.description: MizzouMVC plugin for retrieving meta data created with Advanced Custom Fields

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/miz-accordion-block-plugin
list.description: Plugin files for the Mizzou Accordion Block

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: mizzou/miz-card-block-plugin
list.description: Plugin files for the Mizzou Custom Card Block

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wp-saml-auth
list.description: SAML authentication for WordPress, using the bundled OneLogin SAML library or optionally installed SimpleSAMLphp. OneLogin provides a SAML authentication bridge; SimpleSAMLphp provides SAML plus a variety of other authentication mechanisms. This plugin acts as a bridge between WordPress and the authentication library.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-theme/twentytwentytwo
list.description: Built on a solidly designed foundation, Twenty Twenty-Two embraces the idea that everyone deserves a truly unique website.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/super-simple-account-enumeration-blocker
list.description: This plugin: removes the redirection of a request from /?author=# to an author's pretty permalink, changes author pretty permalinks to /?author=#, changes author feed pretty permalinks to /?author=#&feed=, removes author slug property from user response object for user endpoint in the REST API, and removes overly informative error message when login attempt fails

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/cache-control
list.description: This is not a caching plugin in itself, but will enable you to leverage existing standard compliant caching systems better. You can set different policies for different kinds of pages to suite your website's needs. The Cache-Control for WordPress plugin allows you to set different policies for shared/intermediary and private caches. The plugin sets some sensible defaults for a medium traffic blog that publishes an update or two per week.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wp-cfm
list.description: WP-CFM lets you copy database configuration to / from the filesystem. Easily deploy configuration changes without needing to copy the entire database. WP-CFM is similar to Drupal’s Features module.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/tinymce-advanced
list.description: Advanced Editor Tools (previously TinyMCE Advanced) introduces a Classic Paragraph block for the block editor.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/redirection
list.description: Manage 301 redirections, keep track of 404 errors, and generally tidy up any loose ends your site may have. This can help reduce errors and improve your site ranking.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wordpress-importer
list.description: The WordPress Importer will import content from a WordPress export file.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/classic-widgets
list.description: Classic Widgets is an official plugin maintained by the WordPress team that restores the previous (classic) WordPress widgets settings screens. It will be supported and maintained to 2024, or as long as is necessary.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/classic-editor
list.description: Classic Editor is an official WordPress plugin, and will be fully supported and maintained until 2024, or as long as is necessary.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wp-typography
list.description: Improve your web typography.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/adminimize
list.description: Adminimize that lets you hide 'unnecessary' items from the WordPress backend. Adminimize makes it easy to remove items from view based on a user’s role.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/admin-menu-editor
list.description: Admin Menu Editor lets you manually edit the Dashboard menu. You can reorder the menus, show/hide specific items, change permissions, and more.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/akismet
list.description: Anti-spam protection to block spam comments and spam in a contact form.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/attachments
list.description: Attachments allows you to simply append any number of items from your WordPress Media Library to Posts, Pages, and Custom Post Types.

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/black-studio-tinymce-widget
list.description: This plugin adds a new Visual Editor widget type that allows you to insert rich text and media objects in your sidebars with no hassle. With Black Studio TinyMCE Widget you will be able to edit your widgets in a WYSIWYG manner using the native WordPress TinyMCE editor, just like you do in posts and pages. And if you are a developer you may still switch back and forth from Visual to HTML mode.

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/threewp-broadcast
list.description: Network content syndication made easy! Automatically share content by multiposting between multisite blogs.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/breadcrumb-navxt
list.description: This plugin generates locational breadcrumb trails for your WordPress powered blog or website. These breadcrumb trails are highly customizable to suit the needs of just about any website running WordPress. The Administrative interface makes setting options easy, while a direct class access is available for theme developers and more adventurous users.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/taxonomy-terms-order
list.description: Order Categories and all custom taxonomies terms (hierarchically) using a Drag and Drop Sortable javascript capability.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/jquery-collapse-o-matic
list.description: Remove clutter and save space by placing content inside an expanding/collapsing accordion element.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/cmb2
list.description: CMB2 is a developer’s toolkit for building metaboxes, custom fields, and forms for WordPress that will blow your mind. Easily manage meta for posts, terms, users, comments, or create custom option pages.

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/create-and-assign-categories-for-pages
list.description: This plugin will help you to create the new category for your wordpress pages. You can assign those categories to your pages. With that, you can get your wordpress pages with the help of specific category.

list.name: wpackagist-plugins/conditional-menus
list.description: This plugin enables you to set conditional menus per posts, pages, categories, archive pages, etc.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/custom-sidebars
list.description: Flexible sidebars for custom widget configurations on any page or post.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/custom-permalinks
list.description: Set the URL of any post, page, tag or category to anything you want. Old permalinks will redirect properly to the new address. Custom Permalinks give you ultimate control over your site structure.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/display-posts-shortcode
list.description: Display Posts allows you easily list content from all across your website.

status.description: Not necessary with Block Editor usage. Replaceable with the Query block.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/duplicate-page
list.description: Duplicate Posts, Pages and Custom Posts easily using single click. You can duplicate your pages, posts and custom post by just one click and it will save as your selected options (draft, private, public, pending).

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/edit-flow
list.description: Edit Flow empowers you to collaborate with your editorial team inside WordPress.

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/enable-media-replace
list.description: Easily replace any attached image/file by simply uploading a new file in the Media Library edit view.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/ewww-image-optimizer
list.description: Smaller Images, Faster Sites, Happier Visitors. Comprehensive image optimization that doesn't require a degree in rocket science.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/gutenberg
list.description: Gutenberg is WordPress’s block editor, and introduces a modular approach to modifying your entire site. Edit individual content blocks on posts or pages. Add and adjust widgets. Even design your site headers, footers, and navigation with full site editing support.

status.description: Not for use on a production site.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/health-check
list.description: This plugin will perform a number of checks on your WordPress installation to detect common configuration errors and known issues, and also allows plugins and themes to add their own checks.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/hide-page-and-post-title
list.description: Hide title or Hide page and post title plugin provides functionality to user to hide the page and post title.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/interactive-geo-maps
list.description: Create interactive maps with regions and coloured markers. You can display the world map, continent maps and single country maps.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/add-search-to-menu
list.description: With Ivory Search, you can create an unlimited number of search forms and configure each search form individually to customize WordPress search and perform different types of searches on site content.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/jetpack
list.description: WordPress security, performance, marketing, and design tools — Jetpack is made by WordPress experts to make WP sites safer and faster, and help you grow your traffic.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/knight-lab-timelinejs
list.description: A simple shortcode plugin to add the TimelineJS made by Knight Lab. Supports custom width and height, Google Spreadsheet and JSON data sources “Learn how to create your data source”) and many more.
list.statusDescription: Not Approved. Doesn't work with block editor.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/mailchimp-for-wp
list.description: This plugins helps you grow your email list in Mailchimp. You can use it to create good looking and accessible sign-up forms or integrate with any other existing form on your WordPress site, like your contact, comment or checkout form.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/no-category-base-wpml
list.description: This plugin removes the mandatory 'Category Base' from your category permalinks.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/page-generator
list.description: Page Generator is a mass page generator (sometimes called a bulk page generator or bulk post generator) that creates multiple pages in bulk.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/page-links-to
list.description: Lets you make a WordPress page (or port or other content type) link to a URL of your choosing (on your site, or on another site).

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/posts-to-posts
list.description: Efficient many-to-many connections between posts, pages, custom post.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/post-types-order
list.description: Sort Posts and custom Post Type Objects (custom post types) using a Drag and Drop Sortable JavaScript AJAX interface or default WordPress dashboard.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/proper-network-activation
list.description: When running WordPress MultiSite, you have a very handy feature called network activation. It allows you to activate a plugin for the entire network of sites.

status.description: Not Approved. Not tested with latest 3 major releases.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/post-expirator
list.description: The PublishPress Future plugin allows you to make automatic changes to posts, pages and other content types. On a date you choose, PublishPress Future can delete your post, change the status, or update the post categories, or make other changes.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/regenerate-thumbnails
list.description: Regenerate Thumbnails allows you to regenerate all thumbnail sizes for one or more images that have been uploaded to your Media Library.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/safe-svg
list.description: Enable SVG uploads and sanitize them to stop XML/SVG vulnerabilities in your WordPress website.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/shortcodes-ultimate
list.description: Shortcodes Ultimate is a comprehensive collection of various visual and functional elements, which you can use in the post editor, text widgets or even in template files. Using Shortcodes Ultimate you can easily create tabs, buttons, boxes, sliders and carousels, responsive videos and much, much more.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wordpress-tooltips
list.description: Tooltips are small popup box with more information like video / audio / image / google maps / QR code / wiki / text… and so, tooltips box will pop up when users hover over an element in your pages, the element can be a word in your post, a search form input box, an image in your page, a widget on your sidebar.. and so on.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/user-role-editor
list.description: User Role Editor WordPress plugin makes user roles and capabilities changing easy.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wp-extra-file-types
list.description: This plugin let you add file types to the default list of file extensions supported by the Media Library upload procedure.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/gmap-embed
list.description: WP Google Map is an awesome plugin to use when adding a custom Google map to your website. It is fully customizable and can be used as shortcode.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wordpress-seo
list.description: Write better content and have a fully optimized WordPress site using the Yoast SEO plugin.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/ml-slider
list.description: With MetaSlider you can create a powerful, SEO-optimized slider, slideshow, carousel, or gallery in minutes with the world’s #1 responsive WordPress slider plugin. MetaSlider is the best choice for image, photo, video (YouTube and Vimeo), layer, HTML, WooCommerce, and post feed sliders!

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/timeline-and-history-slider
list.description: Timeline Plugin for WordPress. Easy to add and display history OR timeline for your WordPress website. Also work with Gutenberg shortcode block.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/ga-google-analytics
list.description: This plugin enables Google Analytics for your entire WordPress site. Lightweight and fast with plenty of great features.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/google-analyticator
list.description: Google Analyticator makes it super easy to view Google Analytics within your WordPress dashboard. This eliminates the need to edit your template code to begin logging. Google Analyticator also includes several widgets for displaying Analytics data in the admin and on your blog.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/googleanalytics
list.description: Monitor, analyze, and measure visitor engagement for your site directly from your WordPress dashboard with our Google Analytics plugin. With our Google Analytics dashboard, you’ll be able to conveniently access Google Analytics reports in the same interface you already use every day to write and manage your posts.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/google-site-kit
list.description: Site Kit is the official WordPress plugin from Google for insights about how people find and use your site. Site Kit is the one-stop solution to deploy, manage, and get insights from critical Google tools to make the site successful on the web. It provides authoritative, up-to-date insights from multiple Google products directly on the WordPress dashboard for easy access, all for free.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/wp-google-maps
list.description: The easy to use Google maps plugin. Create a custom Google map, store locator or map widget with high quality markers containing categories.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/google-sitemap-generator
list.description: This plugin will improve SEO by helping search enginess better index your site using sitemaps.

list.name: wpackagist-plugin/accessibility-checker
list.description: Accessibility Checker automatically scans your content each time you save a draft or hit publish, giving you real-time feedback on your post’s or page’s accessibility. Receive a visual overview of how your content stacks up against more than 40 different accessibility checks created to meet Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 success criteria.

list.name: wpengine/advanced-custom-fields-pro
list.description: Customize WordPress with powerful, professional and intuitive fields.

status.description: Approved for use on University of Missouri sites.
